recipe.title: Black-Currant Diablo
ingredients: 1 1/2 oz (3 tablespoons) black-currant nectar (preferably Looza brand)
1 to 1 1/2 oz (2 to 3 tablespoons) ginger ale
instructions: Fill an 8-ounce tall glass with ice cubes, then add nectar, tequila, lime juice, and lime twist and stir. Top off with ginger ale and stir to combine.
